about.title: About Us
about.storyParagraph2: AGILERA Hair Salon is a place where passion meets professionalism. Since 2022, we have been providing top-quality hairdressing services for clients who value elegance and precision.
about.storyParagraph3: Our team is a group of experienced stylists who constantly improve their skills by participating in international training and hair shows.

contact.title: Contact
contact.validEmailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
contact.certificationDescription: We focus on development and quality. Our certificates are the result of work, passion, and continuous training.
contact.expertiseGuarantee: Thanks to this, you can count on professional advice, the latest techniques, and an individual approach. Your hair is in good, trusted hands.

footer.description: Professional hair salon offering comprehensive services for women and men in an elegant atmosphere.

privacyPolicy.pageDescription: Privacy Policy of AGILERA Hair Salon - learn how we protect your personal data.
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: Introduction
section1.content: This Privacy Policy describes how AGILERA Hair Salon collects, uses, and protects your personal data when you use our website and the services offered in our salon.

section2.title: Data We Collect
section2.content: When you use our website and services, we may collect the following types of personal data:

subsection1.title: Data Provided Voluntarily
subsection1.content: Contact details (name, surname, email address, phone number) - when you fill out a contact form, subscribe to a newsletter, or book an appointment at our salon.

subsection2.title: Data Collected Automatically
subsection2.content: Information about your device and browser, IP address, cookie information, and analytical data regarding your use of our website.

section3.title: Purpose of Data Processing
section3.content: Your personal data is collected and processed to: respond to inquiries sent via the contact form, provide hairdressing services, send marketing information (if you have consented), improve the quality of our website and services, and fulfill legal obligations.

section4.title: Data Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties, except when necessary to provide services (e.g., payment service providers, online booking systems) or when required by law.

section5.title: Your Rights
section5.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to: access your personal data, rectify it, delete it or restrict its processing, data portability, object to data processing, and withdraw consent for data processing at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

contact.title: Contact Regarding Personal Data
contact.content: If you have questions about our Privacy Policy or the processing of your personal data, please contact us:

terms.pageDescription: Terms of Service for AGILERA Hair Salon - rules for using our services and website.
terms.title: Terms of Service

section1.title: General Provisions
section1.content: These Terms of Service define the rules for using the services of AGILERA Hair Salon and the agilera.pl website.

section2.title: Definitions
section2.content: Salon - AGILERA Hair Salon, located in Radom, at Słowackiego 50 St. Client - a natural person using the Salon's services. Website - the website available at agilera.pl. Services - hairdressing services provided by the Salon.

section3.title: Booking and Cancellation Policy
section3.content: Appointments can be booked by phone, in person at the Salon, or through the online booking system available on our website.

subsection1.title: Booking
subsection1.content: When booking, please provide your name, surname, and phone number. The booking is valid after receiving confirmation from a Salon employee.

subsection2.title: Cancellation and Rescheduling
subsection2.content: Appointments can be canceled or rescheduled no later than 24 hours before the planned visit. In case of failure to cancel the appointment and not showing up for the scheduled time, the Salon reserves the right to block the possibility of online booking for a period of 30 days.

section4.title: Price List
section4.content: The prices for hairdressing services are available at the Salon and on our website. Prices are subject to change, and Clients will be informed accordingly in advance. The final price of the service may differ from the price stated in the price list, depending on the length, density of hair, and products used.

section5.title: Complaints
section5.content: Any complaints regarding services rendered should be reported immediately after the service or no later than 3 days from the date of the visit. Complaints can be submitted in person at the Salon, by phone, or by email to: kontakt@agilera.pl. Complaints will be considered individually within 14 days of submission.

section6.title: Final Provisions
section6.content: The Salon reserves the right to change these Terms of Service. Changes come into effect on the day of their publication on the website. In matters not regulated by these Terms of Service, Polish law shall apply.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions regarding our Terms of Service, please contact us:
